attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I suggest we withdraw troops from the Middle East and send them up north.Annexe Iceland and hang it's P.M. Seize all assets (for what they are worth) and sell the Icelanders the energy resources the island has to pay off the debts to the U.K.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
